title: Project for all seasons
creator_credit: Canadian International Development Agency and Jim White
brief_description: describes a project funded by Canada and the World Bank to aid agriculture, grazing and road building in Africa. The project also built an administration centre and a town of 85 houses. They helped to provide employment so that their menfolk working down mines in South Africa could return home.
